title: A Republican ends Democrats’ hold on a South Texas Congressional district.
description: Monica De La Cruz, a Republican hard-liner on immigration, defeated Michelle Vallejo in a district Democrats have held for 118 years.
dc:creator: Edgar Sandoval

media:content.media:credit: Verónica G. Cárdenas for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Monica De La Cruz became the first Republican to win an election for Texas’s 15th Congressional District in 118 years.
